title: LG 190 L Direct Cool Single Door 3 Star Refrigerator with Base Drawer  (Scarlet Plumeria, GL-D201ASPX)

product_specification.In The Box:
1 Refrigerator Unit
User Manual
Warranty Card
product_specification.Installation & Demo: This product does not require installation. The features of the product are presented in the user manual that comes with it. Hence, the manufacturer does not provide on-site installation or demo for the product. In case of any queries about the installation or the features of product, kindly call us at 1800 208 9898 or (080) 49400000 for assistance.
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on product and 10 Years Warranty on compressor from LG
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: All Parts Excluding Plastic Parts, Glassware, Bulb and Tube from the Date of Purchase Against Defective Material and Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Parts: Plastic / Glassware / Bulb / Tube. Any Accessories External to the Product. The Product is Not Used According to the Instructions Given in the Instructions Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Site (Where the Premises is Kept) Conditions That do Not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. The Serial Number is Removed, Altered or Obliterated from the Machine. Defects Due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightening, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to the Service Centres or Purchasers Residence

product_description.Smart Inverter Compressor: With its super silent operation, this compressor is designed to provide excellent performance and energy efficiency.
product_description.Smart Connect: It helps in connecting your refrigerator to your home inverter, so your food remains chilled even during power cuts.

review: nice refrigerator beautiful nice cooling nice performance and filpkart delivery amazing very fast delivery
I used this refrigerator very nice product, very fast cool , design also good, evening is good. Thank you so much Flipkart.

Highly Impressed with the product, i would say its a best option if you are a family of 2 or 3 persons. Got delivered in just one day with nice packaging and delivery guys are also very nice. The performance of this refrigerator is very impressive, not too small in size neither too big. The best part of this product is its look. This have enough space to keep plenty of things and cooling is also very good. Freezer makes ice in 30 mins if set to coolest mode and water becomes cold in 15 to 20 mins. Overall very satisfied with this buy. Thank You Flipkart.

best LG refrigerator with no sound and great performance. power saving with 4 star power saving with inverter and super looking design. suitable for small family. about performance, the cooling is very effective with minimum setting and ice making is super fast. handle and bottom tray looks good. the front door design is one of the best one. overall it's a best purchase and I'm happy with flipkart and delivery service.

This wast the best product in this price. and nice deliver from flipkart and is working absulety i have won't.
n... color was. so..good..i love it

Honestly speaking, this refrigerator is one of the most sexiest beast in terms of everything. Initially, I was in a dilemma whether to buy it online or purchase it in an offline shop. But since I had a trust for Flipkart and it's delivery service, I made my mind to get it online only. Plus the offers from Big Billion Day was like a icing on the cake. Without wasting more time, giving a brief summary in terms of pros and cons:-

Pros:-

1) Looks- Mind blowing (5/5)
2) Performance- Terrific, on first time use ice froze in about 30 minutes. (5/5)
3) Capacity- More than enough for a small family of 2-3 members (5/5)
4) Noise- I could barely hear any sound except for a mild humming (5/5)

Cons:-

As of now nothing, only the fridge shakes a bit while opening and closing. I won't mark it as a cons but still could be a helpful info for everyone.

Overall, go for this sexy beast blindly. I am sure you guys will also fall in love with it's stunning looks and performance. I am sure just like me, it won't let you down also.

I received refrigerator 8 days back. Delivery was on time and provided with proper precautions. Glad to see product received at door step without any scratches or any physical damage. Initially Installation support scope was not clear but after customer care call flipkart clear that for this model there wouldn't be any installtion support provided. Littel bit disappointed, but product is easy to install on base stand and some minor fittings. This model has very nice finishing, fresh color, structure and performance wise. No noise, very negligible vibrations (only can be know by keeping hand on refrigerator) & very silent performance; quick ice making performance is also good as observed in last eight days. Statisfied by flipkart service and LG product performance.
Nice product for small family . Fastest delivery by flipkart. working is well. no noise. looking is very good instead of blue.
This a fine fridge meeting all aspects as it should be in it smooth sound good cooling effect. But when power supply switch on it compressor start in 2-3 min time where's light on immidatly
